Desc.entry: Dance academy for adults and children. Teaches ballet, tap, modern, disco, acrobatics, jazz, street dancing and cheerleading. Trains dance teachers.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 6-7pm (cheerleading), 7-8pm (ladies disco), Tues 4.30-5.15pm (ballet), 5.15-6pm (tap), 6-6.45pm (acrobatics), 6.45-7.30pm (street dance), 7.30-9pm (cheerleading), Thurs 4.15-5pm (ballet & tap for children aged 2.5-5 years), 5-5.45pm (modern stage dancing), 5.45-6.45pm (disco), 7.45-9pm (ladies tap), Fri 4.30-5.15pm (ballet), 5.15-6pm (tap), 6-6.45pm (acrobatics), 6.45-7.45pm (advanced ballet), 7.45-8.45pm (advanced tap), Sat 8.45-9.30am (modern stage dancing), 9.30-10.15am (acrobatics), 10.15-11.15 (ballet), 11.15am-12.15pm (tap), 12.15-1pm (disco), 1-1.45pm (jazz)
